Class Player

  • java.lang.Object
    • Player

  • public class Player
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents a player in the Game of PlasterClash. A player has a hand, a tree (deck) and a discard pile. When the tree is empty, the discard is shuffled back into it.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Player()
      Constructs a Player object.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Player

        public Player()
        Constructs a Player object. Players have a Tree, Hand, and Trashheap. Players have a max handsize of 5 and draw at the start of the game.

    • Method Detail

      • numGnomes

        public int numGnomes()
        Adds the number of Gnomes in the player's zones.
        Returns:
        the number of Gnomes the player has

      • endPlayerTurn

        public void endPlayerTurn()
        Ends the player's turn. The player tosses their old hand and draws 5 new cards.

      • drawCard

        public void drawCard()
        Draws a card from the top of the Tree. If the tree is empty, it shuffles the trashheap in.

      • discardHand

        public void discardHand()
        Discards all cards from the hand to the trashheap.

      • hasHand

        public boolean hasHand()
        If the player's hand contains cards.
        Returns:
        if the hand has cards in it

      • discardRandom

        public void discardRandom()
        Discards a random card from to hand to the trashheap.

        Discards a card by index.
        Parameters:
        idx - the index of the card to be discarded.
